text.autoconfig.chargedjump.title: Charged-Jump Config
text.autoconfig.chargedjump.option.charg: Should particles spawn while the jump is charging?
text.autoconfig.chargedjump.option.coold: How many ticks (20 ticks = 1 second) you need to sprint before the jump is ready.
text.autoconfig.chargedjump.option.charg: How fast you will run while charging the jump.
text.autoconfig.chargedjump.option.enabl: Should there be a vignette when the jump is charging?
text.autoconfig.chargedjump.option.loose: Whether you should loose hunger when you do a charged jump or not.
text.autoconfig.chargedjump.option.parti: Select the main particle effect for the jump.
